last_episode_to_air.name: Sleep in Hebburnly Peace
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ben, Susan and her monstrous mother Millie are all stranded in Hebburn for Christmas, but will the Pearson's have room at the inn?

name: Hebburn
overview: Hebburn is a warm and affectionate tale of north east family life. It tells the tale of the Pearson family and their impetuous and ambitious son, Jack, who has left Tyneside for the bright lights and glamour of Manchester. He has secretly married a middle class Jewish girl, Sarah, and realises that it is about time he introduced her to his family.

episodes.name: Welcome to Hebburn, Pet
episodes.overview: Jack Pearson is taking Sarah home to meet the family in Hebburn, but they think she is his new girlfriend, not his new wife that he just married in Vegas. A great big Hebburn welcome awaits.

episodes.name: Ghost Town
episodes.overview: Jack and Sarah are back in Hebburn to help Dot move out of her retirement village. Jack also has big news about a book deal and a big publishing advance. Ramsey attempts to woo Denise with the power of booze.

episodes.name: Dressing Up Fancy
episodes.overview: The red carpet is layed out for the visit of Sarah's parents, Ben and Susan from York. Pauline is immersing herself in Jewish cultureusing google to make sure everything is perfect. Ben and Susan are immersed in Geordie culture with Ramsey's help as well as with Vicky and Denise's choice of outfits for the fancy dress competition at Swayze's.

episodes.name: Feeling Dynamic
episodes.overview: The Geordie answer to Thelma and Louise are on the road; Dot buys Vicki a new car and nearly drives her off a mental cliff.

episodes.name: She Doesn't Just Give it Away
episodes.overview: It is Jack's first day back on the Hebburn Advertiser - and he has plans to transform it into a paper that makes a difference.

episodes.name: A Very Big Day
episodes.overview: It is wedding day in Hebburn. Though Jack and Sarah are technically already married, Pauline and Dot are determined to treat it like their special day.

episodes.name: Welcome Home
episodes.overview: The Pearson family attempt to deal with the aftermath of dad Joe’s stroke. Pauline has got a job to support the family whilst Jack and Sarah have a baby on the way and need to find a place to live. Denise, Jack's ex-girlfriend, is also pregnant. Vicky wants to improve her life but her boyfriend Gervaise could stand in her way.

episodes.name: Easy Tiger
episodes.overview: Sarah and Jack might have moved out, but Dot’s now moving in and soon attracts the attention of a man called Arthur. Pauline’s being bullied at work. Sarah wants Jack to sort their new home out, so he turns to Big Keith for help. Jack finally manages to get a proper book deal, but it’s for something he never intended to have published.

episodes.name: Knocking About
episodes.overview: Pauline is away on a training day and Joe and Dot play, in the good room, breaking all the rules. Arthur tells Joe about his intentions towards his mother, but Joe wishes he hadn't told him. Vicky attempts to help Gervaise with the photoshoot for his album.

episodes.name: Stairway To Hebburn
episodes.overview: Joe's showing romantic signs of recovery, whilst Jack knows it's time to come clean to his beloved wife. But Sarah's father unexpectedly turns up, having left snooty wife Susan...

episodes.name: Still Swayze's After All These Years
episodes.overview: Jack's secret is revealed, but he's still not yet broken the news to Sarah: the race is on before she finds out! Meanwhile, there's plenty to celebrate at a relaunched Swayze's.

episodes.name: Gas and Air
episodes.overview: Sarah's got her PhD and is offered an incredible job abroad, but decides to turn it down because of the family. Joe’s rehabilitation is underway and all he has to do is take the car for a drive and then if he can walk to the pub he can have a drink. Vicky wonders if Lindsay is such a perfect man after all. Jack realises that Sarah’s opportunity is too good to refuse and with a bit of help from Denise, they decide to start a new life away from Hebburn.

episodes.name: Sleep in Hebburnly Peace
episodes.overview: Ben, Susan and her monstrous mother Millie are all stranded in Hebburn for Christmas, but will the Pearson's have room at the inn?
